result.markdown:
---
title: "Automated Machine Learning with H2O (II)"
author: "Gani Cem Türemen"
---


# Challenge Summary

For the challenge, we shall be working with a Product Backorders dataset. The goal here is to predict whether or not a product will be put on backorder status, given a number of product metrics such as current inventory, transit time, demand forecasts and prior sales. It’s a classic Binary Classification problem.

# Objectives

Apply your learning of H2O Automated Machine Learning to predict backorder status.

# Solution

## Import Libraries


::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_762f01dd8674abd2dae5952a3dbc3952'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(recipes)
library(rsample)
library(readxl)
library(h2o)
```
:::


## Load the training & test dataset


::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_9303cd2e492dd0746469256e30357142'}

```{.r .cell-code}
product_backorders_tbl <- read_csv("data/product_backorders.csv")

product_backorders_tbl %>% glimpse()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_5294754ebe99682bdf92d4b3c6025b30'}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

#> $ oe_constraint     <chr> "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "No"…
#> $ ppap_risk         <chr> "No", "No", "No", "No", "No", "Yes", "No", "No", "No…
#> $ stop_auto_buy     <chr> "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Ye…

#> $ went_on_backorder <chr> "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Ye…
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_e64ee48bb03ee8d70407e6594542632f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(seed = 777)
split_obj <- initial_split(product_backorders_tbl, prop = 0.80)

train_set_tbl <- training(split_obj)
test_set_tbl  <- testing(split_obj)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_373d6fa91c702787cc54c31900dca8f0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
recipe_obj <- recipe(went_on_backorder ~., data = train_set_tbl) %>% 
  step_zv(all_predictors()) %>% 
  step_mutate_at(potential_issue,
                 deck_risk,
                 oe_constraint,
                 ppap_risk,
                 stop_auto_buy,
                 rev_stop,
                 went_on_backorder,
                 fn = as.factor) %>% 
  prep()

train_tbl <- bake(recipe_obj, new_data = train_set_tbl)
test_tbl  <- bake(recipe_obj, new_data = test_set_tbl)

train_tbl %>% glimpse()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

#> $ went_on_backorder <fct> No, No, Yes, No, No, No, No, No, No, No, No, Yes, No…
```
:::
:::


## Specify the response and predictor variables


::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_faf9cb0251b84346f354665ef991fd00'}

```{.r .cell-code}
h2o.init()

split_h2o <- h2o.splitFrame(as.h2o(train_tbl), ratios = c(0.80), seed = 767)
train_h2o <- split_h2o[[1]]
valid_h2o <- split_h2o[[2]]
test_h2o  <- as.h2o(test_tbl)

y <- "went_on_backorder"
x <- setdiff(names(train_h2o), y)
```
:::

    
## Run AutoML specifying the stopping criterion


::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_907f20cd1c0572ebdf4f408fbc934f35'}

```{.r .cell-code}
automl_models_h2o <- h2o.automl(
  x = x,
  y = y,
  training_frame    = train_h2o,
  validation_frame  = valid_h2o,
  leaderboard_frame = test_h2o,
  max_runtime_secs  = 60,
  nfolds            = 5 
)
```
:::


## View the leaderboard


::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_848c1350c492c1e0db7017f95c380547'}

```{.r .cell-code}
automl_models_h2o@leaderboard
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

#> 2 StackedEnsemble_BestOfFamily_2_AutoML_1_20230602_153206 0.9424741 0.1830483
#> 3                          GBM_1_AutoML_1_20230602_153206 0.9421039 0.1849211

#> 5                          GBM_4_AutoML_1_20230602_153206 0.9414669 0.1969647
#> 6                          GBM_3_AutoML_1_20230602_153206 0.9360941 0.2023744
#>       aucpr mean_per_class_error      rmse        mse
#> 1 0.7360194            0.1644997 0.2312126 0.05345927

#> 6 0.7176308            0.1699963 0.2421208 0.05862246
#> 
#> [10 rows x 7 columns]
```
:::
:::


## Predicting using Leader Model




::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_4a71414f93f449813ffffbe879049491'}

```{.r .cell-code}
leader_model <- automl_models_h2o@leaderboard %>% 
  extract_h2o_model_name_by_position(1) %>% 
  h2o.getModel()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> StackedEnsemble_AllModels_1_AutoML_1_20230602_153206
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_66ea8f59ff4e240883405bcd8f9178c2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
predictions <- h2o.predict(leader_model, newdata = as.h2o(test_tbl))

predictions_tbl <- predictions %>% as_tibble()

predictions_tbl %>% glimpse()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_a1854383d445b543ed108eb63c53bb7f'}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> Rows: 3,811
#> Columns: 3
#> $ predict <fct> Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Ye…
#> $ No      <dbl> 0.46939312, 0.10956838, 0.12959951, 0.44516257, 0.56051457, 0.…
#> $ Yes     <dbl> 0.53060688, 0.89043162, 0.87040049, 0.55483743, 0.43948543, 0.…
```
:::
:::


## Save the leader model


::: {.cell hash='04_aml_with_h2o_ii_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_e5a51e641ca9014e596afb20b71e962a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
leader_model %>% h2o.saveModel(path = "h2o_models/")
```
:::
